      y - y location of the cell
      Returns:
      SudokuCell at location (x, y)

    • getCell

      public SudokuCell getCell(int groupIndex, int x, int y)
      Gets the SudokuCell in the specified group index at the x and y location given The group index must be by less than the width (or height) of the board and the x and y location is relative to the group. This means the x and y values must be less the square root of the width (or height) of the board.
      Parameters:
      groupIndex - group index of the cell
      x - x location relative to the group
      y - y location relative to the group
      Returns:
      cell in the specified group index at the given x and y location

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Gets the size of the sudoku board Standard board is 9x9
      Returns:
      size of the board

    • getGroupSize

      public int getGroupSize()
      Gets the minor group size of the sudoku board Standard board is 3x3x3x3
      Returns:
